docs.lead_paragraph: Are you ready to reimagine Thanksgiving without the turkey? All month, we present delicious no-meat recipes for your holiday table from some of your favorite chefs and cookbook authors.
docs.snippet: Are you ready to reimagine Thanksgiving without the turkey? All month, we present delicious no-meat recipes for your holiday table from some of your favorite chefs and cookbook authors.

docs.lead_paragraph: Being poor is not a crime. Yet some states and cities are inflicting punitive measures on people who seek government assistance.
docs.abstract: Editorial urges New York City to end policy of insisting on electronic fingerprints for food stamp applicants, regulation which deters needy, law-abiding New Yorkers from applying for help and deprives the city of millions of dollars in federal nutrition aid.
docs.snippet: Being poor is not a crime. Yet some states and cities are inflicting punitive measures on people who seek government assistance.

docs.lead_paragraph: A researcher asserts that antibiotics are permanently altering microbial flora of the human body, with unforeseen consequences.

headline.seo: Scientist Examines Possible Link Between Antibiotics and Obesity
headline.main: In Some Cases, Even Bad Bacteria May Be Good
headline.print_headline: In Some Cases, Even Bad Bacteria May Be Good

docs.abstract: Commentary published in journal Nature by Dr Martin Blaser asserts that antibiotics are permanently altering microbial flora of the human body, phenomenon that may be causing widespread health consequences; research by Blaser and others has led to foundation of Human Microbiome Project, which seeks to sequence genes of the diverse bacteria that populate the human body.
docs.snippet: A researcher asserts that antibiotics are permanently altering microbial flora of the human body, with unforeseen consequences.

docs.lead_paragraph: Though many hotels have perfectly good fitness centers, some are pairing up with brand-name gyms like Core Performance, Exhale and SoulCycle as a way to distinguish themselves.

headline.seo: Places to Sleep Join Forces With Places to Sweat

docs.abstract: Some hotels are pairing up with brand-name gyms like Core Performance, Exhale and SoulCycle as a way to distinguish themselves.
docs.snippet: Though many hotels have perfectly good fitness centers, some are pairing up with brand-name gyms like Core Performance, Exhale and SoulCycle as a way to distinguish themselves.

docs.lead_paragraph: Research is continuing in an effort to determine whether body mass index correlates with actual rates of influenza in people who have been vaccinated.

headline.seo: Study Suggests Obesity Hinders Flu Vaccine
headline.main: Patterns: Study Suggests Obesity Hinders Flu Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Patterns: Study Suggests Obesity Hinders Flu Vaccine

docs.abstract: Study published online in The International Journal of Obesity suggests that overweight people benefit less from the flu vaccine than those of normal weight.
docs.snippet: Research is continuing in an effort to determine whether body mass index correlates with actual rates of influenza in people who have been vaccinated.

docs.lead_paragraph: 5:27 p.m. | Updated On Sept. 23, 2008, Rajat K. Gupta called the hedge fund manager Raj Rajaratnam after a Goldman Sachs board meeting and told him secrets about the company, according to an indictment unsealed last week.

headline.main: Board Meeting and a Crucial Phone Call

docs.snippet: 5:27 p.m. | Updated      On Sept. 23, 2008, Rajat K. Gupta called the hedge fund manager Raj Rajaratnam after a Goldman Sachs board meeting and told him secrets about the company, according to an indictment unsealed last week.
